attacks.name: Grand Falls
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards and attach them to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: G-Max Bombard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
